extendedInfo.description: Color Leap automatically enhances the image quality of your photos by:1. Correcting over-exposed and under-exposed part of your image.2. Compensating for external factors such as haze, smoke, dirty lens, etc.3. Sharpening image objects that are slightly out of focus.4. Reducing the colored noise speckles that commonly occur in low light conditions.Unlike other photo enhancement apps, Color Leap requires no user input or manual adjustments - no buttons, no sliders, no menus. True photo enhancement was never so easy.Snap a photo and instantly compare the Original and Processed images.You can also enhance an existing photo from the phone's photo Gallery.Note: You will not notice substantial changes for photos taken in good lighting conditions.You can email your comments to android@colorleap.com.Enjoy and let us know what you think!www.colorleap.com

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: Waist of time, not sure if any of these goods reviews are even real.
reviews.author: Shane Torresan

reviews.title: How the heck do u use it?
reviews.comment: Couldn\'t figure out how to enhance my photos and when I take a pic with the cam, it stops unexpectedly... blows.
reviews.author: LiLi Lund

reviews.title: Better than you would think
reviews.comment: Whatever simple and fast technique used in this app to post process photos is not only effective, its effective in every situation I\'ve tried so far.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: impressive
reviews.comment: Impressive results without making the photos look like they have been edited.  I was shocked at how good this is.  Best part of all is that it is free!  Better than the other pay apps on the market that claim to fix photos.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: This app saves me so much time!  I would normally tweak brightness/saturation manually on my photos. This app does it for me. It is easy to use, great for low-light and brings out small details.   I am a chef and I use this to make my food look irresistible!!!  It really brings out the colors in food, it helps with contrast and also darkens shadows. The texture of my food is evident and looks more crisp.
reviews.author: Axel V

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Work more on noise reduction. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really good!
reviews.comment: Didnt expect too much with it being a free app, but it is the best photo enhancement app I have come across. Dont bother with any others. Pics look good, a big improvement over the originals. Thanks to the developer, good work mate!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice. But photos dont.show up in gallery automatically. Desire/Desire HD
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: I must its a must app for every one.. Bcoz any mobile camera cant capture always good photos  To improve that its must have... And ita lightweight too
reviews.author: Aafaq ahmad

reviews.title: Verry goooood...
reviews.comment: Better than photoshop which errodes the quality of photo but it kept not only the quality but clarifies and exceeding the quality beyond expectations... good good keep it up.. and yes it worked for me..
reviews.author: Rishav Sinha

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: A must have to clear up your photos, or even those sent to you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: great app. stumbled on it on facebook. love it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better than I expected!
reviews.comment: I didn\'t know what to expect when I downloaded the app... I  was pleasantly surprised when I compared pictures I had previously taken and the pictures that I processed with the app. There was a definite improvement with them... especially ones I had taken in low light conditions.  At first I couldn\'t find the pictures I had processed and finally located a separate folder in my gallery. I now take all my pictures using the app. For serious picture takers this is a \"must have\".
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple and effective.
reviews.comment: Works very well and its only 333kb. Brilliant app. Thanks.
reviews.author: Stuart Hamilton

reviews.comment: nothing special.just enhance little bit brightness.

reviews.comment: Kool app.!!! :)

reviews.comment: It saves an 8 megapixel photo instantly, doesn\'t resize or degrade it, and really does a good job! So far my indoor test pics were really impressive.

reviews.comment: I used this app to enhance a bunch of pictures and I was truely impresssed with the quality and speed.
